description: Try our easy to follow Choc Swirl Meringue Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Choc Swirl Meringue Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Hull and thinly slice half the strawberries. Spread 1 1/2 cups raspberry cream over cake base. Cover with sliced strawberries. Top with second cake layer. Spread 1 cup raspberry cream over cake top. Press meringues around sides of cake, securing with remaining cream mixture. Pile remaining berries on cake and serve immediately.

Press meringues around sides of cake, securing with remaining cream mixture. Pile remaining berries on cake and serve immediately.
